text:
There are so many narrow minded people here in the comments. 
Sure, things might take a hit initially, but it's about the bigger picture. 

China has a SURPLUS of cash. China's economy is growing everyday and if we don't do something about it, China will be the leader in world super powers. 
That's a scary thought if you ask me. China has current day concentration camps, or "re-education centers", as they call them. They are constructing an underground submarine base that will keep submarines forever out of satellite view. They steal intellectual property and make it their own. They are selfish, and it's all about their own self gain and agenda. 

So sure, business may take a hit right now, but it will thrive again.  It's time for us Americans, red or blue, to do our due diligence, research, come together, unite, and stop letting politics divide us. There's 300 million of us here in America, there's 1.3 billion in China. We're going to have to support each other to make sure China doesn't devour our economy and bring us to our knees. Which they would, given the chance.

text:
Well it is damn hard to feel sorry for any of these people.  All those who voted for the mental midget knew what they voted for him for.  The idiots that thought it was a good idea to build "the wall" forgot their properties were directly in the path."But we never thought...."
Farmers thought Trump had a plan to increase exports.  No plan, tariffs.  Farmers losing their farms in record numbers. And ironically, South America has stepped in to take over for the farmers. Hunh, markets that probably will not ever come back. 
 Crab industry,  need to get rid of those nasty immigrants,  you know, the ones who make your business grow??
Seems to me all the hateful reasons that the average Joe voted for Trump for, has turned around and is biting nearly every one of them in the ass.  
Did they really think that running a country was so easy any idiot could do it??  And then to choose an idiot that can't even run his own business no less?  Plenty of information about how he has been a loser at business.
The auto workers that have lost their jobs and are at risk of losing their jobs, oh well.  Seems the tariffs and instability has caused shoppers to shy away from buying new cars.  Who knew an extra 3 to 6 thousand dollars per vehicle would stall an industry??  To those who think "So what, I buy used", guess what, a stalled new car market causes increased ticket prices on used cars.  Called supply and demand.  More demand, higher price.
To the 40% who have had to rely on more credit this last 2 year's??
Tough shit if you voted for him.
You probably spent more time researching your new coffee maker than the guy you put in charge of IDK, everything?
And the die hard "but the stock market is going good", you probably don't even invest there.  And history is a really good place to read about how a booming stock market one day turns into a bleak outcome the next.
If all that he has done was going to be the answer, it would have been done long before now.  This is a no plan, throw shit at the wall and hope something sticks management plan.
Who knew??  The country has been run like a business all along.
And now we have hired a manager who is going to bankrupt the business ( just like the golf course in Puerto Rico,  the airline business, the Trump university, and on and on).
Next time you all vote, pretend you are looking for a new coffee maker and do a little research.

text:
Trumps past behaviour and treatment of the American People is Beyond disgusting, most people are unaware that his treatment, attitude and actions have caused Suicides. 
--- CONTRACTORS LOST MILLIONS AFTER TRUMP WENT BANKRUPT.
ATLANTIC CITY, N.J. Patricia Paone was resting at home last summer when an apparition appeared on the TV ‚Äî a famous businessman who had struck a deal with her husband years before."He‚Äôs a crook!" she roared.
----  A quarter of a century had passed since Donald Trump REFUSED TO PAY $1.2 MILLION for the paving stones her late husband installed at Atlantic City‚Äôs Taj Mahal casino.

--- The contractor who provided the onion domes atop the Taj had to eat $2 MILLION IN LOSSES! 

~~~~ One of the hardest hit was John Millar, a marble supplier who Trump OWED $3.9 MILLION to.
 
Millar eventually had to lay off workers, shut down his business Avalon Commercial, close many of his retail stores and borrow from friends to make ends meet, according to court documents and Millar‚Äôs lawyers and former employees.
-- The contractor who supplied the Carrara marble from Italy ended up filing for personal bankruptcy. 

-- The contractor who put in the bathroom partitions had to lay off his brother.

After the Taj opened in April 1990, the self-anointed "King of Debt" owed $70 million to 253 contractors employing thousands who built the domes and minarets, put up the glass and drywall, laid the pipes and installed everything from chandeliers to bathroom fixtures.
 A year later, when the casino collapsed into bankruptcy, those owed the most got only 33 Cents in cash for each dollar owed, with promises of another 50 cents later. 
It took years to get the rest, assuming the companies survived long enough to collect.

For the entire article go to :
https://torontosun.com/2016/06/29/hes-a-crook-little-guy-contractors-lost-millions-after-trumps-taj-casino-went-bankrupt/wcm/b5fcb52f-652f-4051-9db6-a3821613e2be

text:
LETS BE CLEAR. These are corporations, not individual lobster fisherman going out and making a living by bringing their catches to market. These are major corporations that pay their employees next to nothing and they make MILLIONS from china. All while their employees have crap hourly pay, crap benefits, and  ZERO upward mobility. 


Notice CNN didn't interview any employees about job satisfaction, pay, work environment, benefits, workers rights, and upward mobility.


They are selling this like it is Joe from down the street that goes out every morning to catch some lobster and sell it at market to make a living and provide for his family. 


See how quick these corporations will like it if we open the market up to ANY fisherman that wants to sell to china. These fishing corporations won't allow it, they will only let you work for them. They will undercut all your prices do to their scale and you won't be able to compete and make any living wage. Then guess what? You will be working for them and their crap pay/benefits, the cycle starts all over again.

Trump's Professor,¬† William T. Kelley taught marketing at Wharton School of Business and Finance, University of Pennsylvania,¬†for 31 years, ending with his retirement in 1982. Professor Kelley stated that ‚ÄúDonald Trump was the dumbest g*ddam student I ever had.‚Äù 

Professor Kelley told me 100 times over three decades that ‚ÄúDonald Trump was the dumbest g*ddam student I ever had.‚Äù Kelley¬†told me this after Trump had become a celebrity, but long before he was considered a political figure. Kelley¬†often referred to Trump‚Äôs arrogance when he told the story that Trump came to Wharton thinking he already knew everything

text: I am shocked by some of the moronic comments and also just by this moronic "news" story.  Also shocked people are saying oh the rich liberals need to pay 2 dollars more.  That's not how it works at all.  The tariffs don't affect the price in the USA outright.  Only in China which Maine Lobster is a luxury item that wealthy Chinese people buy and eat.  25 percent increase does not actually affect the bottom line.  In fact they sell to China to begin with because they can charge a high premium price for the product.  This only means they don't sell as much to china and sell more in the USA.  China has actually made the USA prices more expensive because a lot of the product is sold overseas. As for saying oh 6 people are not employed and Idk if I want my kids going into the business is straight fear mongering.  We are talking about the fact that when China stops screwing us on such lopsided tariffs consumers and sellers will benefit all the way around in the USA.  It will bring billions and billions into the USA each year benefiting millions and millions of people as well as making goods made in china cheaper for people to buy.  Straight up fear piece to scare idiots.
